Posts.Content: Dec 6, 2015 07:58AM Ohiotripleplus wrote: My radiation tech told me not to use any cream or gel until I have visible skin irritation. My Radiology M.D. has said just to use corn starch to prevent dampness under my breast. So far so good.. 13/33 treatments so far.
